TopicTitle: I’m stuck in the R&D Screen

Articles.Content:
When I go into the R&D screen I get stuck and can’t save, quit the game or click the exit button. 

My mods are: 

ASET AGENCY, ASET Avionics, ASET Props, Avionics Systems, B9 Part Switch, Click through Blocker, EVE-Stock , EVE- Redux, Kerbal engineer redux, Kerbaloons Continued, Procedural Farings, Raster Prop Monitor, Real chute , Scatterer, Toolbar Controller, Zero MiniAvc
+ your logs, maybe? would be very helpful

Try alt-f12 to open the cheat window and reset "input locks". That might enable the exit button again.

Does anything in the R&D screen work? What happens when you click on science nodes?
